========================================
GITHUB ACTIONS CI/CD WORKFLOW
========================================

Repository: https://github.com/YOUR_USERNAME/Eksperimen_SML_Saepulloh

Workflows:
1. Preprocessing Pipeline
   - Trigger: Push to preprosessing/
   - URL: https://github.com/Saepulloh07/Eksperimen_SML_Saepulloh/actions/workflows/preprocessing-pipeline.yml

2. Model Training Pipeline
   - Trigger: After preprocessing
   - URL: https://github.com/Saepulloh07/Eksperimen_SML_Saepulloh/actions/workflows/model-training.yml

Features:
✅ Automated data preprocessing
✅ Data quality validation
✅ Model training (baseline & tuned)
✅ Docker image build & push
✅ Artifact storage (30 days retention)
✅ Comprehensive logging

Manual Trigger:
- Navigate to Actions tab
- Select workflow
- Click "Run workflow"
- Choose parameters if needed

Artifacts Location:
- Preprocessed data: workflow artifacts
- Trained models: workflow artifacts
- Docker images: Docker Hub

========================================
